pageContext.claim: “But $3.2 trillion — just think of it — in tax cuts for American families.”
pageContext.analysis: This is an inflated number. Trump is adding all of the provisions in the tax plan that would reduce tax revenues paid by families to the government, but ignored provisions that would increase them, such as elimination of personal and dependent exemptions. When tax increases are included, the tax cut amounts to just $1.5 trillion.
